Mike is a white 17 year old american teenager. He likes to joke around and tries to make the best out of bad situations. He's very selfless and tends to think of others before himself.

The Witch is a pissed off old woman of unknowable age. She's sick of everything from the laughter of children to the sight the sun setting on the pacific ocean, it all makes her angry. Someone was eventually going to cross her on a bad day and Mike just happened to be that someone.

Mike lives with his mother and older sister. Their ages, personalities, and appearances are all up to you.
